name: 4.1 Get Candidate Details from Email Edit

parameters.content: These steps receive candidate details when the user clicks Edit Content in the email. The system captures the candidate ID and email address through a secure link, allowing the user to update the content and send it back to the same candidate without any mismatch.

parameters.query:
UPDATE onboarding.candidates
SET templates = COALESCE(templates::jsonb, '{}'::jsonb)
                || jsonb_build_object('edit_offerletter_viewed', true),
    updated_at = NOW()
WHERE id ={{ $('details').item.json.id }};

parameters.responseBody:
